nodes.name: Start
nodes.description: It is a dark and stormy night. You are very tired from a hard day's travel. A small keep lies to the south.

nodes.name: Keep Entry
nodes.description: You are standing in the keep's entry. Low-burning braziers cast long shadows on the walls.

nodes.name: Great Hall
nodes.description: You have entered the Great Hall of the keep. The room is dimly lit, but you see doors in all four directions.

nodes.name: Armory
nodes.description: This small room serves as the armory for the keep.

nodes.name: Kitchen
nodes.description: Nothing edible has been prepared here in weeks. You find nothing but rat droppings and broken furniture.

nodes.name: Treasure Room
nodes.description: The walls are covered in rich tapestries and a large chest sits against the back wall of this room.
